title: Brahmachari
occurrences: Where's that Brahmachari?
But you haven't mentioned your name as yet. - l'm Brahmachari.
Mr. Brahmachari and Miss Rupa Sharma will present you a song now.
lf Brahmachari learns that l've started shady work again, he'll bash me up!
Brahmachari has got me an excellent waiter's job at the Plaza.
.. that are lying scattered. - What's your real name? lt can't be Brahmachari.
Yes? - ls Mr. Brahmachari in? - l am he.
Goodbye, Mr. Brahmachari. Children, remain happy.
But l have no other option. Brahmachari has done so much for me.
Haven't you started loving Brahmachari? - God, what should l do?
Bring her from Brahmachari's house; l won't let my mother learn anything.
Brahmachari's house should be confiscated tomorrow.
Brahmachari, l'm ready to give you Rs.20,000/- ..
Children, you'll have to go now; Brahmachari has found a wife.
lf you want to go to Brahmachari, l'll drop you in my car.
Will you take me to Brahmachari? - Why not?
Brahmachari, it's time for your item now.
Brahmachari seized them from me. .. Everyone's in a hurry!
Basant told me that Brahmachari has seized those letters from him.
Thank you, Mr. Ravi! - Let Brahmachari come now!
Come, Brahmachari, l was waiting for you.
Here, Brahmachari - talk!
Brahmachari, l'm really ashamed for whatever happened.
Your seeing that girl with Brahmachari that day was a sham.
You are the only girl in Brahmachari's life.
.. so you're no longer a ''brahmachari'' (celibate). - Leave it!
